statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY BB.Name, CC.Name) as RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.BrandID , AA.ChannelID , AA.OrderDate , AA.OrderQty , AA.OrderAmt
, BB.Name as BrandName , CC.Name as ChannelName
FROM dbo.TOrderSum AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TBrand BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.BrandID = BB.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TChannel CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ChannelID = CC.ID WHERE AA.OrderDate >= #StartDate# AND AA.OrderDate <= #EndDate#
AND AA.ChannelID = #ChannelID#
AND AA.BrandID = #BrandID#
ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.BrandID , AA.ChannelID , AA.OrderDate , AA.OrderQty , AA.OrderAmt
, BB.Name as BrandName , CC.Name as ChannelName
FROM dbo.TOrderSum AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TBrand BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.BrandID = BB.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TChannel CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ChannelID = CC.ID WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TOrderSum ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, BrandID, ChannelID, OrderDate, OrderQty, OrderAmt ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #BrandID#, #ChannelID#, #OrderDate#, #OrderQty#, #OrderAmt# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TOrderSum SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, BrandID = #BrandID# , ChannelID = #ChannelID# , OrderDate = #OrderDate# , OrderQty = #OrderQty# , OrderAmt = #OrderAmt# WHERE ID = #ID#
statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY CC.Name) as RowNo , BB.ID , BB.CreatedOn , BB.CreatedBy , BB.CreatedByName , BB.UpdatedOn , BB.UpdatedBy , BB.UpdatedByName
, AA.ChannelID , AA.BrandID , CC.Name as BrandName , AA.ChannelMargin , AA.BrandMargin , BB.OrderDate , ISNULL(BB.OrderQty, 0) as OrderQty , ISNULL(BB.OrderAmt, 0) as OrderAmt
FROM ( SELECT AA.ChannelID , AA.BrandID , AA.ChannelMargin , AA.BrandMargin FROM dbo.TChannelBrand AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ChannelID = #ChannelID# AND AA.StartDate <= CONVERT(DATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), #OrderDate#, 112), 112) AND ISNULL(AA.EndDate, DATEADD(DAY, 1, CONVERT(DATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), #OrderDate#, 112), 112))) >= CONVERT(DATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), #OrderDate#, 112), 112) ) AA LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ID , CreatedOn , CreatedBy , CreatedByName , UpdatedOn , UpdatedBy , UpdatedByName , ChannelID , BrandID , OrderDate , OrderQty , OrderAmt FROM dbo.TOrderSum WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ChannelID = #ChannelID# AND OrderDate = CONVERT(DATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), #OrderDate#, 112), 112) ) BB ON AA.ChannelID = BB.ChannelID AND AA.BrandID = BB.BrandID LEFT JOIN dbo.TBrand CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.BrandID = CC.ID ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY CC.Name) as RowNo , BB.ID , BB.CreatedOn , BB.CreatedBy , BB.CreatedByName , BB.UpdatedOn , BB.UpdatedBy , BB.UpdatedByName
, AA.ChannelID , AA.BrandID , CC.Name as ChannelName , AA.ChannelMargin , AA.BrandMargin , BB.OrderDate , ISNULL(BB.OrderQty, 0) as OrderQty , ISNULL(BB.OrderAmt, 0) as OrderAmt
FROM ( SELECT AA.ChannelID , AA.BrandID , AA.ChannelMargin , AA.BrandMargin FROM dbo.TChannelBrand AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.BrandID = #BrandID# AND AA.StartDate <= CONVERT(DATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), #OrderDate#, 112), 112) AND ISNULL(AA.EndDate, DATEADD(DAY, 1, CONVERT(DATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), #OrderDate#, 112), 112))) >= CONVERT(DATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), #OrderDate#, 112), 112) ) AA LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ID , CreatedOn , CreatedBy , CreatedByName , UpdatedOn , UpdatedBy , UpdatedByName , ChannelID , BrandID , OrderDate , OrderQty , OrderAmt FROM dbo.TOrderSum WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE BrandID = #BrandID# AND OrderDate = CONVERT(DATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), #OrderDate#, 112), 112) ) BB ON AA.ChannelID = BB.ChannelID AND AA.BrandID = BB.BrandID LEFT JOIN dbo.TChannel CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ChannelID = CC.ID ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT AA.* FROM dbo.TOrderSum AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ChannelID = #ChannelID# AND AA.BrandID = #BrandID# AND AA.OrderDate = CONVERT(DATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), #OrderDate#, 112), 112)
statements.delete: DELETE FROM dbo.TOrderSum WHERE ChannelID = #ChannelID# AND OrderDate = #OrderDate#
DELETE FROM dbo.TOrderSum WHERE BrandID = #BrandID# AND OrderDate = #OrderDate#
statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY CC.Name, BB.Name, AA.ChannelMargin, AA.BrandMargin) as RowNo
, AA.ChannelID , CC.Name as ChannelName , E2.Name as ChannelManager
, AA.BrandID , BB.Name as BrandName , E1.Name as BrandManager
, AA.OrderQty , AA.OrderAmt
, AA.ChannelMargin , AA.OrderAmt * AA.ChannelMargin/100.0 as ChannelAccAmt
, (100.0 - AA.BrandMargin) as BrandMargin , AA.OrderAmt * (100.0 - AA.BrandMargin)/100.0 as BrandAccAmt
, AA.BrandMargin - AA.ChannelMargin as SaleMargin , AA.OrderAmt - AA.OrderAmt * AA.ChannelMargin/100.0 - AA.OrderAmt * (100.0 - AA.BrandMargin)/100.0 as SaleAmt
FROM ( SELECT AA.ChannelID , AA.BrandID , CB.ChannelMargin , CB.BrandMargin , SUM(AA.OrderQty) as OrderQty , SUM(AA.OrderAmt) as OrderAmt FROM dbo.TOrderSum AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TChannelBrand CB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ChannelID = CB.ChannelID AND AA.BrandID = CB.BrandID AND CB.StartDate <= AA.OrderDate AND ISNULL(CB.EndDate, DATEADD(DAY, 1, AA.OrderDate)) >= AA.OrderDate WHERE AA.OrderDate >= #StartDate# AND AA.OrderDate <= #EndDate#
AND AA.ChannelID = #ChannelID#
AND AA.BrandID = #BrandID#
GROUP BY AA.ChannelID, AA.BrandID, CB.ChannelMargin, CB.BrandMargin ) AA LEFT JOIN dbo.TBrand BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.BrandID = BB.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TBrandManager B1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.BrandID = B1.BrandID AND B1.StartDate <= #EndDate# AND ISNULL(B1.EndDate, DATEADD(DAY, 1, #EndDate#)) >= #EndDate# LEFT JOIN dbo.TEmployee E1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON B1.EmployeeID = E1.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TChannel CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ChannelID = CC.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TChannelManager C1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ChannelID = C1.ChannelID AND C1.StartDate <= #EndDate# AND ISNULL(C1.EndDate, DATEADD(DAY, 1, #EndDate#)) >= #EndDate# LEFT JOIN dbo.TEmployee E2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON C1.EmployeeID = E2.ID ORDER BY RowNo
